tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Highly Recommended.
I had got this huge bump on my Lower lip. It had happened due to lip bite. Over a period of time it grew out very very big. I had consulted other dentist who had prescribed medicines but nothing helped. Finally I consulted Dr. Gaurav Goel. He advised me to immediately get it removed. He and his senior surgeon removed the big chunk successfully. It was as complicated process but they really managed well without distorting my lip. To my surprise the process was Painless. Recovery was also smooth. A big thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Gaurav for dental treatment for my elderly father. The diagnosis was RCT and procedure was painless and took very less sittings . Dr. Gaurav  is very friendly and humble while explaining the treament. The clinic is in great shape and I highly recommend to visit Dr. Gaurav for any dental procedures. He is great with impatient and anxious patients, as my elderly father. Thanks Dr. Gaurav.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Gaurav is really such a nice person. He helped me a lot when I was in trouble because of tooth pain. He explained everything and advised me very nicely. 

I didn't feel pain and uncomfortableness for one moment when he extracted my 2 teeth and clean all teeth. Now I am in process for teeth crown. 

Thank you!

review: The doctor told the whole thing right about my problem, the price was also less from other dentist but he is not taking the guarantee of any filling and treatment, which other doctors are taking, so I give 4 stars rather than 5 stars
reply_text: Thanks for the kind words Rajatji...just to clarify my stand..for anything artificial put in the human body it's not correct ethically to give any guarantees..doing so is just an act of capturing the patient..no one can give any assurance for rct or how long any filling will last..we at our clinic use the best of materials and techniques..rest success lies on so many other factors which are not in our control
